curam.util.workflow.impl
Class BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.base.BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin
      curam.util.workflow.impl.BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin
All Implemented Interfaces:
curam.util.workflow.intf.BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin
public abstract class BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin
extends curam.util.workflow.base.BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin

The BizObjAssociation entity stores details of associations between tasks and other rows on other database table. This API provides functions to manipulate the data on the BizObjAssociation entity and its functions should be used rather than direct access to the functions present on the actual entity.

public BizObjectAssociationDetails read(long bizObjAssocID)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
Returns the details of an business object association based on the specified business object association identifier.

Parameters:
bizObjAssocID - The identifier of the business object association.
Returns:
The business object association details.
Throws:
AppException - ID_BUSINESS_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_DOES_NOT_EXIST - if Business Object Association with specified identifier does not exist.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

countOpenTasksByBizObjectTypeAndID

public long countOpenTasksByBizObjectTypeAndID(long bizObjectID,
                                               java.lang.String bizObjectType,
                                               java.lang.String closedTaskStatusToIgnore,
                                               java.lang.String completedTaskStatusToIgnore)
                                        throws AppException,
                                               InformationalException
Returns a count of the tasks associated with the specified business object type and business object identifier. Tasks with a status of Completed or Closed will be excluded from the results returned.

Parameters:
bizObjectID - The unique identifier of the business object type.
bizObjectType - The type of the business object.
closedTaskStatusToIgnore - A task status of closed that will be ignored.
completedTaskStatusToIgnore - A task status of completed that will be ignored.
Returns:
The number of tasks associated with the specified business object type and business object identifier.
Throws:
AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
